article.title: South Carolina U.S. Export Assistance Centers Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the South Carolina U.S. Export Assistance Centers.
article.content:
​Greenville U.S. Export Assistance Center

Denis Csizmadia, Manager

Greenville U.S. Export Assistance Center
Buck Mickel Center, Greenville Technical College
216 S. Pleasantburg Drive, Suite 243
Greenville, SC 29607
Phone: 864-250-8429
Fax: 864-250-6729
denis.csizmadia@trade.gov

Counties: Oconee, Pickens, Greenville, Anderson, Abbeville, McCormick, Greenwood, Laurens, Union, Spartanburg, Cherokee, York

Columbia U.S. Export Assistance Center

Dorette Coetsee, Director

Columbia U.S. Export Assistance Center
USC Moore School of Business
1705 College St., Suite 600
Columbia, SC 29208
Phone: 803-777-2571
Fax: 803-777-2615
dorette.coetsee@trade.gov

Counties: Chester, Fairfield, Newberry, Saluda, Edgefield, Aiken, Lexington, Lancaster, Chesterfield, Kershaw, Darlington, Lee, Richland, Sumter, Calhoun, Clarendon

Charleston U.S. Export Assistance Center

Phil Minard, Manager

Charleston U.S. Export Assistance Center
1362 McMillan Ave., Suite 100

North Charleston, SC 29405
Phone: 843-746-3404
Fax: 843-529-0305
phil.minard@trade.gov

Counties: Orangeburg, Barnwell, Bamberg, Allendale, Hampton, Jasper, Beaufort, Colleton, Charleston, Dorechester, Berkeley, Georgetown, Williamsburg, Florence, Marion, Marlboro, Dillon, Horry

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723​). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F, 8:30 a.m. – 6:00 p.m. EST.​

article.seometadatadescription: Contact the South Carolina U.S. Export Assistance Centers.
